<template>
  <button class="delete__button">
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<script>
// Кнопка удалить
export default {
  name: 'my-delete'
}
</script>

<style scoped>

.delete__button {
  background: none;
	color: rgb(253, 56, 56);
	border-color: rgb(253, 56, 56, 0.3);
	padding: 0;
	font: inherit;
	cursor: pointer;
	outline: inherit;
  border-radius: 3px;
  width: 100px;
  height: 40px;
}

</style>
